panels.title: TXN INCOMPLETE RATE/SEC

panels.title: OVN HOST CPU USAGE/SEC (SUM PER THREAD)

panels.title: TXN ERROR RATE/SEC

panels.title: CONTAINER RESTARTS (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Total successful transactions across all nodes.
panels.title: TOTAL TXN SUCCESS (RATE/SEC)

panels.description: Total transactions that are resulted in no change to a database across all nodes.
panels.title: TOTAL TXN UNCHANGED (RATE/SEC)

panels.description: rate of successful transactions
panels.title: TXN SUCCESS RATE/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: rate of increase of incomplete transactions
panels.title: TXN INCOMPLETE RATE/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: rate of increase of unchanged transactions
panels.title: TXN UNCHANGED RATE/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of times the OVSDB transaction has successfully completed
panels.title: TXN SUCCESS (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Top $topk transactions that are  abnormal: error, aborted, try_again, uncommitted
panels.title: TXN ABNORMAL (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Number of transactions that haven't completed yet.
panels.title: TXN INCOMPLETE (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Number of transactions that don't change the OVS DB.
panels.title: TXN UNCHANGED (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages that have been  queued because it couldnt be sent using the  underlying virtual connection to OpenFlow devices per second
panels.title: RCONN QUEUED/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages that have been dropped because of the queue overflow per second
panels.title: RCONN_OVERFLOW/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages that have been sent to the underlying virtual  connection (unix, tcp, or ssl) to OpenFlow devices.
panels.title: RCONN_SENT/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages that  have been dropped because the send queue had to be flushed because of reconnection per second
panels.title: RCONN_DISCARDED/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages sent to the OpenFlow Device.
panels.title: VCONN_SENT/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages received  from the OpenFlow Device per second
panels.title: VCONN_RECEIVED/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of attempts to connect  to a remote peer (active connection) per second
panels.title: VCONN_OPEN/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Specifies the number of attempts to connect to a remote peer (active connection) per second
panels.title: STREAM_OPEN/SEC (TOP $topk)

panels.description: Number of times ovn-controller has translated the Logical_Flow table in the OVN SB database into OpenFlow flows per second
panels.title: LFLOW RUN/SEC (TOP $topk)
